Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.wsio.IAeWebServiceEndpointReference

Packages that use IAeWebServiceEndpointReference
org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel Root package for the Active Endpoints Runtime for Axis (rtaxis).  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.addressing   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.endpoints Endpoint reference factory, serializer, and deserializer.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage Classes related to saving and restoring the state of processes.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.addressing Handles partner addressing (finding the correct endpoint reference for a given business partner).  
org.activebpel.wsio Root package for the Active Endpoints external web service and invoke classes. 
org.activebpel.wsio.receive
